wanderingMiniBosses:FullOfOpenings.NAME: Full Of Openings
DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack card, lose #y
Gold. This is removed by defeating the Thief Of A Billion Guards.

wanderingMiniBosses:NotAskedDonationsToT.NAME: Not Asked Blood Donations
DESCRIPTION: When you play a Power card, take #y
blockable damage. This is removed by defeating the Thief Of A Billion Guards.

wanderingMiniBosses:TrapsAtThePotionSlot.NAME: Traps At The Potion Slots
DESCRIPTION: When you use a potion, lose #y
HP. This is removed by defeating the Thief Of A Billion Guards.

wanderingMiniBosses:TooCautious.NAME: Too Cautious!
DESCRIPTION: When you play a Skill card, lose #y
Gold. This is removed by defeating the Thief Of A Billion Guards.
